name: 吳建文
objective: 本課程探討資訊系統在現代組織中所扮演的角色，課程重點將放在企業電子化和資料庫技術，同學在修課過後將具備相關知識。課堂中的資訊實務技術演練，將有助於同學有效率地解決相關問題。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: Foundations of Information Systems in Business
Week 3~4: Competing withInformation Technology
Week 5~6: Basic Database Processing
Week 7~8: Structured Query Language
Week 9~10: The Relational Model and Normalization
Week 11~12: Database Design Using Normalization
Week 13~14: Data Modeling with the Entity-Relationship Model
Week 15~16: SQL for Database Construction and Application Processing
Week 17: Joomla for Content Management
Week 18: Project
materials:
David M. Kroenke and David J. Auer
Database Processing: Fundamentals, Design, and Implementation
11th Edition
Pearson
